page.title: 02SCHOOLS TAKING PART
page.content:
Tameside has 86 Primary Schools, 4 Nursery Schools,19 High Schools 2 VIth Form Colleges and a College of Technology. Children and teachers from the following schools shared the task of collecting information for this block. All Saints High School- Dukinfield Audenshaw c of e Primary_ Audenshaw Audenshaw High School- Audenshaw Clarendon Fields Primary- Dukinfield St.John's Primary School- Dukinfield St.Peter's Primary School-Ashton West End Primary School- Ashton Yew Tree Community School-Dukinfield
The next two pages describe a typical day in the life of a pupil from one of these schools.
